name: AngularJs SB Admin Theme  with Codeigniter 3.0
tagline: A sample demonstration of SB-Admin Angularjs Admin Template theme with Codeigniter 3.0
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ sudo git clone https://github.com/mehdi89/sb-admin-angularjs-codeigniter.git
$ cd to your project
$ npm install
$ bower install
```

If you're interested for further development contact with owner (@mehdi89)

### Authors and Contributors
@mehdi89 (owner)

### Support or Contact
if you have any question contact hasanmehdi89@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
